promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary cat steel-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Titanofelis, a a gigantic legendary cat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Brave Blade. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "steel" or "Titanofelis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, cat-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This legendary monolith, dubbed Titanofelis, dwells atop lofty peaks. With its Brave Blade, it carves paths through rock, its colossal feline form echoing metal resilience and majesty.
